title: Jane Hunt – 2022 Statement on Public Targets for Companies House
author: admin
summary: The statement made by Jane Hunt, the Parliamentary Under-Secretary of State for Business, Energy and Industrial Strategy, in the House of Commons on 19 July 2022.
